name: Animal Building:Idle Adventure
description:
Are you looking for a real epic adventure？

Get ready to cross an island of beauty and magic, solve different levels of puzzles, build fancy constructions, and meet countless cute animal friends!

Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all! In this game, you can explore and experience different places, merge superior animal builders, build different styles of houses, increase the camp’s income, attract special animal guests, share your score with other players, and eventually become an island tycoon!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Drag Animals Together to Merge
- Click Resources to Collect
- Make Money and Unlock Items


FEATURES:
- OFFLINE MODE: no need for internet connection to play, just have fun whenever you want
- IDLE MANAGEMENT: create your animal builders and they will automatically start to build
- 3D GRAPHICS: enjoy the beauty of the island and forest from multiple perspectives
- MERGE: match your animal builders together to merge new animals and evolve them into superior ones
- COLLECT: dogs, turtles, rabbits, pandas, and even dinosaurs are waiting for you to be friends with
- BUILD: strategically assign animals to build your own home
- DESIGN: unlock over 100 kinds of eye-catching decorations, choose your favorite ones and DIY the camp as you like
- OPEN MAP: explore different locations, encounter various events, and reveal secrets of the island
- MULTIPLAYERS: meet online players all over the world, visit popular camps and claim special gifts!

With the help of animal builders, you can spend the money you make to unlock various items and decorate your own camp. Whether it’s a garden, a bridge or even a big swimming pool in the backyard, it’s all up to you！

Animal Building: Idle Adventure is a relaxing idle game that is suitable for all groups! No matter olds, teens, boys or girls can all have fun on the island. The satisfying RPG elements in the game would also make you enjoy the process of exploring and merging.

Download the game please and let the story begins now!
